meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intellectual.
meanings.sent1: Her intellectualnesses shone through in her insightful analysis of the book.
meanings.sent2: His intellectualnesses were evident in his deep understanding of complex theories.
meanings.sent3: Despite his playful nature, his intellectualnesses always impressed his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her intellectualnesses were a beacon of light in the sea of ignorance.
meanings.sent5: The intellectualnesses of the professor made the lecture engaging and informative.

meanings.definition: The intellectual capacity or ability of a person.
meanings.sent1: His intellectualnesses allowed him to solve the challenging puzzle quickly.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her impressive intellectualnesses in various academic fields.
meanings.sent3: His intellectualnesses were put to the test during the intense debate competition.
meanings.sent4: The intellectualnesses of the young prodigy amazed everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The intellectualnesses of the team members complemented each other, leading to a successful project.
